casebody.data:
ODOM
v.
LANE. No. 10P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 29, 2004. John E. Grupp, Charlotte, Jack L. Cozort, Raleigh, for Carolinas-Anson Healthcare, Inc. William Simpson, Kinston, for Odom. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 588 S.E.2d 548 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of January 2004 by Defendant (Carolinas-Anson Healthcare, Inc. d/b/a Anson Community Hospital) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of January 2004."
